Howard Baker told us that a treaty on strategic nuclear weapons was possible, but not probable in the remaining months of the Ronald Reagan administration. The president wants a good treaty, not a fast one, Howard Baker said.( What might Ronald Reagan have thought when our recent lame duck Congress rushed through a similar treaty last December?) Richard Rip Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal." Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Speaking at the Pro Bowl, Reggie Wayne told reporters that seeing Peyton Manning throw 11 interceptions during a three-game losing streak was a shock. The main thing we realized, he's not immortal. He's real. He's not a machine. It goes to show you this game is so competitive, even the guys on top can hit a wall somewhere. In Philadelphia, Michael Vick not only hit the wall, he spent a couple of years behind them in a prison cell.
